Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the character Wikus van de Merwe in *District 9*?
Options:
A. a) Sharlto Copley played the role of Wikus van de Merwe.
B. b) Wikus van de Merwe is a character at the MNU Department of Alien Affairs.
C. c) Wikus van de Merwe is portrayed as a confident leader.
D. d) The MNU Department of Alien Affairs plays a significant role in the story.
Correct Answer: a) Sharlto Copley played the role of Wikus van de Merwe. & b) Wikus van de Merwe is a character at the MNU Department of Alien Affairs. & d) The MNU Department of Alien Affairs plays a significant role in the story.
